text: Joseph Horatio Anderson was a Colonial American architect in Annapolis, Province of Maryland in the late 18th century. He was the architect for the third and current Maryland State House, the second St Anne's Church, and Whitehall, a plantation house near Annapolis. == References == == External links == * Historical Images of the Maryland State House, Maryland State Archives Category:Annapolis, Maryland Category:Architects from Maryland Category:18th-century American architects Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing
title: Joseph Horatio Anderson
